attributes.action: introduce laws that require information about where a  product originates from to be clearly defined at the point of sale additionally if applicable on the product and the outer packaging.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All UK consumers, whether they care or not, have a right and a moral obligation to know where the items they purchase originate from. 
Government guidelines to define terms such as "Made in"; "Manufactured in"; "Produced in" "Assembled in" etc
